author: jmsnell
msg: This is largely a patch up.  We will need to revisit this (and the IRI parsing code in general) to ensure
that it can work with as broad a range of IRI/URI schemes as possible.

author: imario
msg: VFS-42: allow to create a "friendly uri" which is one without the password. Instead the system will render "*****" if the original filename contained a password.

author: agilliland
msg: Second commit for Roller 3.1 Theme Encapsulation work ...
1. Updated ThemeManager to import resource files as well as templates.
* added ability to import static resources.
NOTE: this work only partially implements the overall functionality of the proposal.  there will be further commits to complete the work.

author: asankha
msg: Update for AXIS2-1286 as per Sanjiva's comment to return an empty envelope if the ServiceClass returns null
